requirements.summary: Remove the Government Notifications & Circulars section from the website by removing the Notifications component from App.tsx, removing navigation links from Navigation.tsx, and ensuring layout coherence
acceptanceCriteria: The Notifications component is no longer rendered anywhere on the page.
No broken layout or empty whitespace gap appears where the section previously existed.
The navigation bar no longer contains a link to the Notifications/Circulars section.
All other page sections continue to render correctly.

file_operations.description: Remove the import statement for the Notifications component and remove the <Notifications /> component from the page layout composition, ensuring the remaining sections flow naturally without layout gaps
Remove any navigation link or menu item that references the Notifications/Circulars section, ensuring the navigation menu remains functional and properly styled after removal
